mapper.insert: insert into vehice (vid, vcolor, vbrand, vbuytime, platenum, theftnum, framenum, motornum, regtime, isinsurance) values (#{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vbuytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{platenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theftnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{framenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{motornum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isinsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update vehice set vcolor = #{vcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vbrand = #{vbrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vbuytime = #{vbuytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, platenum = #{platenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, theftnum = #{theftnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, framenum = #{framenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, motornum = #{motornum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isinsurance = #{isinsurance,jdbcType=INTEGER} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vid, vcolor, vbrand, vbuytime, platenum, theftnum, framenum, motornum, regtime, isinsurance from vehice where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select vid, vcolor, vbrand, vbuytime, platenum, theftnum, framenum, motornum, regtime, isinsurance from vehice
select * from vehice where regtime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select * from vehice where vid in
#{vid}
mapper.insert: insert into vehice (vcolor, vbrand, vbuytime, platenum, theftnum, framenum, motornum, regtime,isinsurance) values (#{vcolor},#{vbrand},#{vbuytime},#{platenum},#{theftnum},#{framenum},#{motornum},#{regtime},#{isinsurance})
